website_summaries.verdict: In spite of some quality concerns, it has a lot to offer including good looks and generous space – but it's probably a good idea to take inventory of the pieces before you assemble it.
pros: Offers ample space that holds TVs up to 70" wide
Easy to put together and attractive – a few owners report that it has an "expensive" look
cons: A few reports of missing and/or broken pieces upon arrival
Some received units with doors that were misaligned once assembled
The laminate exterior chips fairly easily

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tv Stand
customer_reviews.text: Overall I dont have any complaints about this tv stand. Took apox 2 hours to install.
customer_reviews.author: SiscoKid

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand
customer_reviews.text: Nice as described arrived on time easy to put together. My only suggestion would be to make sure you have a drill of some kind! My hands were raw using a regular screw driver because I couldn't find the bits for my drill! So it went fairly qiuck an well until I got to the door hinges that game me hell with that screwdriver. But all in all nice tv stand I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Shandell Hudson

customer_reviews.title: I will be honest and say that the furniture is nice. I received mine in good condition
customer_reviews.text: Buying this type of furniture online is always a risk. I read a bunch of reviews stating that they receive their units with damage. The damage its done with all the transport and there is nothing we can do as customers. I will be honest and say that the furniture is nice. I received mine in good condition. Assembly took 3 hours since i took my time to do everything right. On the manual there is a couple of errors but nothing impossible to figure it out. I have a 65 inch tv that fits perfect on this unit.
customer_reviews.author: josue cruz

customer_reviews.title: Chinese Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is the kind of item that you should never purchase online. I just learned that lesson the hard way. This item is very poorly made. Many of the screws did not fit into the holes so I had to use a power drill to widen them. Also, several of the pieces did not line up properly. Do not waste your hard earned money on this flimsy Chinese junk.
customer_reviews.author: Sporadic

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the finish and it was very easy to assemble though instructions didn’t come in the package, I had to look up the pdf manual. The price is great. The only reason I’m not giving this 5 stars is because when I peeled one of the stickers off, it stripped off the material and the front of the top shelf has a bump that’s quite noticeable. Other than that, it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I mean... It does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: I put a tv on this. That's what it is designed for, right? It's still on it. It doesn't do much. Just sits there and holds things. Sometimes I open the cabinets and move things between the shelves. Sometimes I put my remote on it just so I have a reason to touch it. The TV is a 45" from 6 years ago. It's pretty heavy and it hasn't bent the wood yet. It has a nice finish, considering it's panel board. Sturdy enough, came with all the components I needed for assembly. It's a TV stand. What more can I say about it? My TV stands on it.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Hardin

customer_reviews.title: 50 inch TV and decorations
customer_reviews.text: such a great stand, easy to set up and it adds a great look to my living room! I was able to fit a LG 50 inch TV and had some room for my souvenirs, PS4 and video games!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality entertainment center with quality hardware
customer_reviews.text: For around $80 you can't get a better deal. The instructions were simple and the hardware included was nice not cheap stuff. It even comes with stickers to cover some screws that are exposed. If your worried about buying this bc the price is low and might be cheap don't hesitate! I would recommend not to tighten the pole support on bottom and top too tight. I had to super glue one of the support poles on top bc I tightened the screw too tight and the metal nut broke free inside. No big deal and superglue held it tight within 12 hours. Couldn't be happier with the price and the quality! I would deff buy more items from Altra!
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Graf

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in good condition. Was pretty easy to assemble. For the price it looks great. A couple of things to remember, it is particleboard so you need to treat it very carefully. Putting the screws in takes patience. Make sure the doors are on exactly right, may take a couple of tries of adjusting the hinges. It took my 14 year old grandson 45 minutes to put together. If you put it up on a table or bench to assenble it goes faster. Glad we ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: judbun

customer_reviews.title: ... the mail but even more excited when it was super easy to put together and looks even vetter than ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this in the mail but even more excited when it was super easy to put together and looks even vetter than I expected! If I had a drill it would have taken less than 15 minutes. Instructions were easy and all of the parts were labeled correctly. Super happy!
customer_reviews.author: goldielocks26

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 50" TV. Great stand with plenty of room for cable box, router, soundbar, etc. on 3 shelves under the TV. Also has enclosed shelves with a door on either side to feep DVD's, CD's, etc out of sight. Good, strong TV cabinet that was easy to put together and easily supports our 70 lb older TV, even though it's rated @ 55 lb.
customer_reviews.author: Bill 32958

customer_reviews.title: This looks great and all and it's perfect for my video games ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks great and all and it's perfect for my video games but these were the cheapest screws I have ever seen. 80% of them couldn't go in all the way because they'd strip with two rotations. I was sweating by the end of the build because of the force I was putting to try to force these screws to turn. I'm extremely glad this experience is behind me, even though I'll be reminded of it every time I try to get into one of the side doors seeing as I couldn't get all 8 awkwardly placed screws to go in all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: My 55" TCL television fits on this perfectly. Enough room for DVD player and surround sound receiver on the bottom middle shelf. Side doors give space for movies, etc. Top shelf (just below TV standing area) was a smidge too short for my speakers, so I used a hole saw to create little wood discs that I painted black and used as spacers to make more room. Got longer bolts and it worked perfectly. Was pretty easy to put together. Took time, but the price is so good that I would rather spend some time assembling than buy some expensive unit already put together.
customer_reviews.author: Erik B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This TV stand is exactly what I wanted. Easy to put together, took me about an hour by myself. I had no issues with it whatsoever. It looks great as you can see
customer_reviews.author: Melody Zarnke

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely garbage Chinese ply board that broke INSTANTLY.
customer_reviews.text: Took it out, started assembling, it was so weak the metal screw in leg instantly busted out the entire ply board hole and immediately made the entire rest of the stand garbage. I didn't torque it down hard or anything literally just shredded the hole and ruined the entire thing at the very first assembly instructions. All i'm going to say is if you have an Oz of respect for the quality of your furniture I wouldn't buy this for $20. Oh also the hardware they send, the bolts are too short to even thread through the top base board LOL, literally everything is wrong with this absolute garbage. Amazon should immediately stop selling this trash.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Okay quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: There are some places (at corner) that the gray paint was broken, exposed the inside light brown material. Also, the edges are not covered well, so we can see the white / light brown line between the connections of 2 pieces. The instruction is fairly easy to follow. We could complete the assembly within 3 hours (2 people). I would say with this price (less than $200), it's okay, but if you're looking for something more sturdy, high quality, you would look for something else, especially if this is for 65' television or larger. It fits our 55' television nicely (have some extra on both sides), and the style is good enough, match to our living room decor.
customer_reviews.author: White May

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price! Looks better in my living room than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.text: PROS: The instructions were fairly easy to follow, and they use those Camlock screws - an improvement over your typical Ikea-style furniture. All the pieces were there, nothing missing. The measurements were accurate. CONS: Took about 4 hours to assemble. Be prepared to have a big space to do this in! Some of the boards were chipped and damaged on delivery. Not really noticeable luckily, but its fiberboard and not real wood. The 2 cabinet doors - one opens and closes easily, the other is not exactly flush. I could take it off and reinstall it though. No major complaints. I paid just under $150 and I'm happy with my purchase, for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: James Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Delightful surprise
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting such nice TV stand, special the tube on picture look something plastic but what was my surprise that wasn't actually is pretty heavy too...this TV stand is very sturdy and fits perfect on my small room...I put together all by myself even the doors that from previous experience I hated to assemble this one wasn't bad at all...also I lay down the unit on back to make easy to install the doors...overall I'm pretty happy to have a very sturdy furniture without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: F. Costa

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice tv stand for the money. It arrived with no damage. All of it was packaged really nicely. Each piece was labeled, and all the screws and small bits were even labeled in individual packages making it easy to quickly find and identify. The instructions are minimal, but I didn’t find them difficult to follow. I put this together by myself in about an hour and didn’t have any issues. Once assembled, it felt sturdy and it looks really nice. If you are on a budget, I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of reviews and decided to order this TV stand despite on very many negative reviews. People who wrote bad reviews all received this item damaged. It is either hit or miss. Our stand arrived in perfect condition, nothing was damaged. My husband assembled it very quickly without any troubles as the instructions were clear. It looks beautiful. Unfortunately the review options here does not let me ttached the picture. But i would say if someone like the way it looks (and it does look exactly as pictured), then try it. Amazon Prime is incredible service and would replace it if anything is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Alina Platonova

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed by this product. The particle board is very weak and easy to break. After fully assembling the shelf, I was positioning it under the TV that is mounted on the wall, 3 of the small legs snapped off. I am unable to screw them back in because the particle board cracked. For the amount of money I spent on this, I expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart T.

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable Price with Acceptable Quality
customer_reviews.text: A little shorter than what I expect. It is compressed wood and the outer layer is look like wood Paper, not even decals or stickers, so be careful when cleaning with liquid. The base is combined of 3 single pieces of wood, not whole piece like other cabinet or stand. The instruction is very clear. Parts are numbered so you can easily put them together. In general it looks nice and good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but sturdy and attractive tv stand
customer_reviews.text: Definitely need some time to assemble. Assembly directions are thorough. You must follow them directly. Avoid trying to shortcut the assembly. All parts went together well. No missing pieces. Relatively sturdy when put together correctly. Only had a little trouble with the door hinges not being located correctly when predrilled at factory. Have a 65” sitting on top with tip prevention clip/straps...very sturdy. Happy with this purchase decision
customer_reviews.author: Larry Zolezzi

customer_reviews.title: Great Entertainment Center, But...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really nice tv stand, But it is fragile, the cheap printed on oak material gives it a luxury appeal. If It delivered with no defective boards peeling, I would give it 5 stars for sure. But the good news is, if you call the company’s customer service number they will send you free replacement parts within one year. i’m my case the doors came broken, it’s partial board. Not very strong. So, I recommend before you put it together check all the boards and just call the company and order new ones, because this One took me about 3 hours to assemble. Keep your Manual! The part numbers are on there! You will need it!
customer_reviews.author: jonnyquest024

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but too small
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this is too small. The doors, the cabinets, the height of the top shelf, the overall height of the unit. Hard to tell until it's actually assembled, but consider a larger model. The top shelf doesn't have enough clearance for a center-channel speaker, and the lower shelves barely have enough room for a normal audio receiver. The cabinets are too small to realistically put anything in them. The unit itself is really low, so the TV is lower than comfortable viewing angles. Get this if you need it for a very small space, not a larger room.
customer_reviews.author: tlking4

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially at this price point.
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for my downstairs "mancave", and it's a real good looking piece of furniture (at least the black or if it's espresso). If you like what you're seeing in the pictures you're gonna like this one cause that's what you'll be getting, nothing more nothing less. Construction is pretty good but not perfect, but it's better than expected for the money. From what I remember the instructions weren't all that great, but it's not complicated to put together. Highly recommended, we ended up buying another one for upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Henrik

customer_reviews.title: Wood cheaps to easily
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving it 2 stars this far because I was not able to put the tv stand together. It arrived in perfect condition, but every time I tried to lightly screw in a screw the wood it cheap. I gave up after seeing how much damage was being done from the littlest movement and put it aside until I can find someone to assist me with it. Update: I was able to put it together and the top base is not connected to the 2nd board due to the cheap wood. I still put my TV on the stand in hopes of the weight pushing it down, and so far so good. So I now love my TV stand!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I would have ideally wanted something more substantial, but for this price, it's perfect for what we need it for. Comparable to Ikea quality. I would recommend this for anyone on a budget and who can take care of more delicate furniture. As so many state about the bolts for legs breaking, it clearly says all over the product to NOT tighten them too tight. I had absolutely no issues with this. Don't be scared away by someone else's brut force in building. It's not high end. Take care while putting together and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shane and Amber

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Build, Sturdy, Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I’m did it by myself with no help. Just need a screw driver. Directions are simple easy to follow. It’s sturdy and nice looking. Advice: Don’t over tighten screws ect when putting together this kinda wood material. I put a few of these together over the years same wood material. And I see a few people had trouble with a board cracking ect. — This type of material is not meant for that kinda work, and you shouldn’t use a power tool to put it together either. Take your time, and you’ll get your moneys worth. :)
customer_reviews.author: SleepingforDreams

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Product crumbled when using fasteners by hand. When screwing one of the legs in the wood-like material crumbled and now the leg is held up by the weight of the unit. Also, on the left side of the unit a regular screw completely popped out the side which is very noticeable. The material is of very poor quality and this should not happen when you are putting it together by hand and not power tools. Save your and money and the headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Well engineered, but....
customer_reviews.text: The piece is well engineered. However, they managed to ship it without assembly instructions so had to hunt up the manufacturer's site and print them. Then there are multiple metal poles in the assembly, each with a threaded post on one end. All but one of the threaded posts was bent putting the post at a slight angle and making alignment with the screw/holes on each end more difficult than it should have been. The engineering is forgiving enough for this, but greater care in manufacturing/quality control would make all the difference. Good concept, weak packaging and rather shoddy manufacturing, but if you can get past all that, the final product is not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Martin

customer_reviews.title: A greet TV stand for the price and looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: A great TV stand for the price and looks nice. Is a smaller then it looks in the pictures. The instructions weren’t the best, I believe it was a few pictures. Mostly had to be done with common sense. Not that bad. I’ve had it a couple years and it’s still lasting. Some of the door brackets have broken. Wasn’t user error, just popped off and you can only drill the same hole so many times.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Have a standard receiver? Then read.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have enjoyed everything that I've purchased from Ameriwood and this is no exception. The instructions are easy to follow, setup was a breeze, and it looks great. My only complaint is that there is no place to put a standard size receiver except the middle without a shelf. You CAN put the shelf in on the top peg, but it'd leave barely a half an inch of exhaust for the hot air. I will be adding a backing to cover up all the wires, which can be clearly seen in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to hold a 65" TV and this was inexpensive and wide enough to do the job. It arrived a day early and my wife and another lady assembled it with no help in 2 hours. It looks and works fine, I did have to make one adjustment, with the TV cable box, the DVD player and the computer router I had 7 wires on the shelf running to the one large hole in the middle of the back wall of the stand. Solved the ugly wire problem with a hole saw and 2, 1 inch holes in the back covers. It looks excellent now.
customer_reviews.author: WATCHER

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Disregard the negative comments on here. This T.V stand is wonderful, very sturdy and well made, very easy to assemble. I have a 65" flat screen on it, I do suggest buying a pedistool base for larger T.V's since the feet that come on most larger T.V's are closer to the end and likely won't fit. Budget friendly and great quality
customer_reviews.author: 🌟

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: for the most part this was pretty easy to assemble, the directions for about 2 of the steps however were misleading based off of the picture where a screw that i had to insert in the picture were further apart than what it was displayed in the picture and I had one screw that when i tried to screw it it ended up getting messed up but those were the only problems i encountered while assembling this. It took me a little under 2 hours to assemble this by myself, it has a nice height to the actual tv stand too. and it is pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Durrell gresham

customer_reviews.title: Great minimalistic tv stand, for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: First package was damaged,and I requested the refund, but the seller was very polite and really wanted us to have a best experience, so he sent a new one (no charge) and it came perfectly. It took my husband little more than hour. For 65inch tv is perfect, with lots of space for other little things as well. We didnt wanna buy expensive heavy tv stand, since we gonna move out to another state in couple years anyway. So we are very happy with this purchase, but honestly I was nervous first, to purchase from a third party seller )) lol So I would recommend this, if you are looking for a simple and affordable tv stand.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Panels scratch extremely easily.
customer_reviews.text: This was a nightmare to put together because of my arthritis. I still haven’t finished putting a door on because it will involve contouring into a position that would have been difficult at 20. I like the end product but BE CAREFUL not to lay the tops of the panels against anything, even against the floor! because the surface can be scratched very easily and the scratch will be white (on a black background). The paint is very thin. Not the best quality in parts, but a nice design.
customer_reviews.author: H. Veale

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier with this
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this. I thought about this item for weeks before buying it and made sure to measure out the space it would take. It isn't a large TV stand at all, but it perfectly fits my needs. And I'd recommend when putting the doors on, to attach the hinges to the inside before to the door itself. If you try to mount the hinge to the door and then to the inside, you run the risk of tearing it off due to its weight and angle. My TV is 48" btw. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Sunjeet Baadkar

customer_reviews.title: damaged parts, not properly aligned.
customer_reviews.text: recently purchased this stand. i would not stand my tv on it. its cheap 100 bucks, but the boards did not align properly. also the unit has scuffs and scratches everywhere. i wont be buying furniture like this again. very good clear instructions and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: 10secwrx

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was because this product was used, and sold by Amazon Warehouse, but the bolts were totally mixed and not labeled at all. Surprisingly, no bolts were missing (when I figured out what to use where). Also, some holes (for the bolts) were bad positioned, making it even more difficult to assemble certain parts. Nevertheless, I was able to set it up at the end, but not thanks to whoever made and packaged this product. Once assembled, it supports the TV weight well, though. Finally, I wish the little doors could somehow "lock" when closed, as they open and move freely when I have to move the furniture from place.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Montes

customer_reviews.title: good, cheap... but
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and it works, but it is not perfect the stand is sturdy and looks nice, but the storage just isn't good. there's an adjustable shelf in both cabinets but the cabinet isn't big enough to allow for you to put even Blu-Ray disks on both shelves without turning them on their side one or the other shelves. The unit is not very deep, my TV's stand is pushed all the way as far back as I can go on the stand and my center channel speaker can barely still fit on the stand. I really enjoy it, and again the construction of it is quite stable, I just can't do better than 3 stars because of the storage issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: Definitely false advertising! Holds only 60 lbs, not the claimed 120 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: In the write-up of this product on the Amazon website, it says that it can hold TV's of up to 120 lbs. That is one of the principal reasons I purchased it. I want it to be able to hold some weight. When the item arrived, the label that came with it (see photo) says that "The TV must weigh less than 60 libs." Really? If it weren't more of a hassle to return it rather than keep it, this would be back on the truck right now.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Cay

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality, easily broken and scratches.
customer_reviews.text: So I just finished to assemble my tv stand and honestly I would return it back, but we were halfway to assemble it and we honestly wanted to have our new TV done before Christmas. It’s honestly cheap quality and it easily scratches and I already have chipped edges and broken leg, we fixed it, but it tells you a lot about the quality. And the most important part, we got plain screw without shreds, so we had to find a screw ourself. It’s very easy to assemble tho.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV stand for the money
customer_reviews.text: This TV stand by Ameriwood Home Carson is a good TV stand. It works perfectly in a bedroom that it was bought for. What makes this product excellent is the easy to follow instructions, probably the best I have seen so far. Parts bags were labeled and called out in the instructions by bag number. It really could not have been any easier to assemble. The customer service was also excellent. One of the parts was damaged and we submitted a claim on-line, which said it would take 7-14 days, however with in 2 days the replacement part had arrived. I would recommend this buy to anyone that needs an inexpensive TV stand.
customer_reviews.author: The M Family

customer_reviews.title: Good value but the cabinet doors came loose before long
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I’d say this is a good value considering the price. The sturdiness is pleasingly solid, I don’t feel worried having my TV on here and there hasn’t been any cosmetic issues with the wood laminate. However, the doors for the cabinets on the side both came very loose(one fell off). Maybe my roommate didn’t assemble it well, but that’s the only disappointment. I might give it 3 stars for that, but it was exactly what I was looking for at a really good price point. I also don’t doubt it could just be fixed by tightening things up but we’re too lazy.
customer_reviews.author: cody clark

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more and get a food one...not this!
customer_reviews.text: I put this out on carpet....after putting it together and turning it over I find these huge gouges out of it. The doors wont shut without scrapping! I have tried everything but they drag so I either take them off or I ruin the sticker wood grain they put in this clap board thing. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I bought the smaller one a few years back for my TV. In 2019 on Black Friday I upgraded my TV by 25 inches and it wouldn't fit on my small TV stand. I really loved the other one and decided to go with the same product. Putting it together was a bit of a puzzle as there were many pieces and quite big. After it was put together it was nice and sturdy. Doesnt wiggle or anything. It is quite heavy so moving it a little bit took a bit of muscles but it looks great! I had more issues putting the smaller one together than I did this one!
customer_reviews.author: Megan O.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my TCL 55 inch 4K TV. Needed something inexpensive and wide enough to accommodate a 55 inch TV with separate legs (like the TCL has) instead of a mono-stand like most TV's have. This fit the bill perfectly! It is a great value, very well built and a breeze to assemble! In fact, they even label each fastener pouch (unlike most companies) so you don't have to GUESS which size screw goes where. Very nice! They definitely care about their product and their customer!
customer_reviews.author: Dotnettex

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fit my 55in TV. It sits comfortably in the center though it does hang off the edges just a tad but not enough to be significantly noticeable. Its super easy to assemble, I think it only took me 2 hours possibly less. There is a great amount of room for everything I want to put in it and for the price point, I couldn't resist. Its great wood. The open area just below where the TV sits is great for putting anything that needs a constant airflow. Its one of my favorite pieces of functional furniture that I've bought so far.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. Fairly easy to assemble when all pieces are correct.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I'm not terribly disappointed but it's impossible to get the cabinet drawers from hanging too low and I received the wrong part for one area that that that kfully I was able to work around but you can tell whoever is assembling the parts to pack is not the happiest of employees. I would have called about this but the last thing I wanted was an unassembled mess lying around for the slow process of calling after the weekend and maybe getting my part a week or two later.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy51806

customer_reviews.title: I've built every piece of furniture I have in my house so I'm pretty familiar with what goes where and how
customer_reviews.text: Giving a one star due to the lack of quality this piece of furniture has. I've built every piece of furniture I have in my house so I'm pretty familiar with what goes where and how. This brand is by far the worst I've ever had to deal with. Came with holes not even big enough to put the necessary pieces in and absolutely nothing lined up. The wood is so cheap I dusted off the wood splints it created and it scratched the surface. If you want to spend three hours of your life swearing, this is the furniture for you. It looks great from afar but up close and personal it is wobbly and crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this TV stand it exceeds expectations. I bought the 70” black TV stand and it looks great and is very sturdy. Took a little over an hour taking my time reading the directions and using my drill. No idea why a lot of people are having a hard time with this. There is no need to muscle everything on because then of course something’s going to break....it says not to use power tools but I set my power tool on a low torque setting and everything is snug and it’s super sturdy. I would definitely recommend this product just take your time and don’t overtighten.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Petito

customer_reviews.title: Check for all parts and faulty parts
customer_reviews.text: I got this last year and due to space I never got to assemble it and recently did that this month when I moved. The box was still in good condition because I kept it in a good place. After almost got done with the assembly I found not 1 but 2 faulty parts and due to it being over a year I didn’t have any warranty to call back. Sadly money gone down the drain, will not be buying furniture online anymore. Also forgot to add that while putting on one of the bottom legs for stand, the screw would not screw on the way all the way! It was missing screw for additional shelf to, just faulty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute worst thing I have ever put together. I had to call 3 times on 3 separate occasions for replacement parts. After having it for 3 weeks and finally getting it assembled, my son scooted it maybe 2 feet across the hardwood floors and the bottom leg broke off. Don not waste your time buying this. The customer service department were great to send the replacement parts but the quality is cheap. I should have known for the price I paid for it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: if the instructions were better the door hardware should be attached prior to completing ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described and would have been ok, except the holes for attaching the doors were not drilled. I had to disassemble the work I had done and drill the holes myself. if the instructions were better the door hardware should be attached prior to completing the main unit. After drilling the holes I attached the hardware first avoiding having to work in a constricted way. I ruined the left door while I was drilling the holes that should have been done at the manufacturer. User error but very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Marlin

customer_reviews.title: Came in fast, easy to assemble and looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Product is awesome and built very well. A couple issues with the instructions. Did not caution about over tightening the small legs so just did hand tight, well when all done saw where screw came through top of bottom shelf. No big deal as can hardly see it. Then after page showing how to install door hinges, on the next page when you are done trying to get them aligned petfectly, is the adjustment instructions. Would have been nice to have known about that going in. Because the finished stand turned out awesome? Will still give 5 stars. Recommend this stand to anyone that wants great quality at low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Rich L

customer_reviews.title: Not IKEA
customer_reviews.text: Every company now wants to copy the IKEA model. In this case, the manual could be better made if you had someone testing the model before. There are some places that you need to change the step and the steps are too crowded with information. The material is fine, just like any other IKEA or IKEA like product My biggest issue was the packaging. A lot of stereo foam that could be replaced by hard cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Magalhaes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for the price! Got it for $80 and for that price extremely happy with it! I read the reviews about getting extra wood glue and to screw hinges on first... but decided to go direction by direction... and the directions were super easy to follow , got it done within 2 hours and wasn’t hard at all... sorry to those that had a scratch in bent pieces delivered but mine was perfect, didn’t have a scratch or dents... gave a four-star only because it’s a little smaller than I expected but perfect size for me anyways
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Looks are amazing, but the first one came with some broken pieces. The box was undamaged so components were packaged even though they were broken. I contacted Ameriwood about the issue and they informed me that they would send replacements immediately. A couple of weeks went by with no replacements, so I called again and was informed that they didn't have any of the pieces and it was too expensive for them to ship the pieces from the plant in China. The rep apologized for not contacting me about the problem and informed me that he was sending a complete replacement unit to me for my trouble. The completed unit is now in the family room and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: M Conn

customer_reviews.title: Great price, perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: I put it together in around 25 minutes. Perfect size for my 50" TV. Seems as sturdy as any pressboard build-your-own furniture. Downside... The finish scratches easily and I got a piece of tape on the door... Pulled the "veneer" right off. Its just a woodgrain wallpaper on there. I slapped a sticker over the bad spot and you would never know.n But for the price and what I need it for... Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: GrokkoW

customer_reviews.title: Look a little more before fr gf
customer_reviews.text: Well package was damaged not this company s fault but corner was nicked. This is boarder line cheap on turn to much can cause complete fail so be careful and it was labeled cherry.. I received it and it was black and cherry. I just made it work. But over all if you not looking for a sturdy last a long time piece this is not it. And of you are ocd like me. The pieces don't match flush.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Either Great or Meh Depending on What You Pay
customer_reviews.text: If you look at the product's prices, it varies widely . . . I paid $52.00, but I have seen it over $100.00. My main gripe with the product is that the interior shelves (i.e. those behind the doors are poorly sized, and therefore wobble and shake about a little bit. If I were using the interior shelves with any frequency, I would have been quite frustrated with the poor build quality. However, I got more than I paid for at $52.00. At $90.00? I would probably look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I'm not gonna lie, this was a little challenging to put together. The size is smaller than what I expected, but it works well for my small apartment and looks nice with the matching coffee table. I like that it isn't super bulky (definitely a plus with frequent moves), but I wish it was a little taller and more stable. All in all, this is a good product for the price and I would recommend it for anyone with limited space.
customer_reviews.author: ErikaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second I've bought from this manufacturer and I've liked them both. You need to be careful about screwing into the wood and DO NOT overtighten! Use wood glue for the dowels because they aren't very tight. The instructions are very basic. Just take your time and separate everything first and make sure the picture looks like what you are putting together. Otherwise the finished product is good.
customer_reviews.author: shawnplus8

customer_reviews.title: Love this stand, super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Got a new TV and didn't think of the fact that it wouldn't fit on my old stand lol. So hurried up and ordered this one. Delivery was projected to be Friday but it arrived 3 days early (bonus!). I'm just super happy with my choice. I wanted something with doors to hide junk and i have lots of room to put more stuff on it if I want. Yes it comes in pieces parts, it's SUPER easy to assemble, but it did take me almost 2 hours. Just gotta be patient and go step by step. It holds my 65" tv nicely and again, I'm just thrilled. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Piratekitty

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend.  Looks great, easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: So super happy with this!! It looks great and was super easy to put together -about 45 minutes (44 year old woman). Very sturdy and stable. The only thing I am not super thrilled about is the bottom shelf -the screw holes are showing. It needs to have small covers or something (see photo). No damage when product arrived, packed very securely with packaging material, including corner protectors
customer_reviews.author: C. McChesney

customer_reviews.title: Simple and sleek
customer_reviews.text: For the most part we really like this TV stand. I will say if you have a bigger or heavier TV (ours is around 50" if I recall) you will more than likely need to modify it with some support or just buy something else altogether. For us this was perfect; I wanted something understated, simple and something that would easily hold my gf's game systems. I'm happy to say that's what I got and I recommend it :)
customer_reviews.author: Kiera K

customer_reviews.title: Assembling it was a PAIN
customer_reviews.text: All i am gonna say is WOW. Wow on the building part. It was a headache. Im no expert at setting up furniture, it took us a minimum of 6 hours easily for 2 people to do this follwing instructions and common sense. Its gonna be different for everyone but holy hell it was a PAIN IN THE BUTT. Because of this im taking off a star. Aside from that, it looks good, does its job and holds my 55 inch TV well. I can place things inside the little cabinets and all. Im very satisfied. If product came already built, 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Parasitologist

customer_reviews.title: Good stand but may come with defective pieces
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a tv stand for a while but the one and two star ratings for this product made me second guess it. Finally I caved and purchased this stand. The product came quickly and took me (by myself) about an hour and a half to build. None of the pieces were defective and the stand feels sturdy. My 55" tv fits well enough. However my friend purchased this stand and it came with two left side doors. While the stand may be a good product buy with the precaution that it may came with defective pieces
customer_reviews.author: John lauer

customer_reviews.title: bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the TV cabinet I received last week in two sizes, one is 50 inches, and the other is 70 inches. I opened the other. There are many scratches in it. It took two hours to install it. It looks good, but it’s not good to look at too many scratches up close. Return the unopened ones, but they charge a fee of $31, which is very unreasonable. Please be careful before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: corner tv space saver cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed in my space. It fits perfect in my space and gives me lots of extra storage. I bought a floor stand pole tv mount to use in the corner and that fees up the top to put my portable file and my printer. I moved from house to small apt and u have to think outside the box for extra space. I definitely would recommend this cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... took some time to put together but it looks great and fit my LG 50" nicely
customer_reviews.text: It took some time to put together but it looks great and fit my LG 50" nicely. For anyone who buys it the entertainment center will assemble upside down and when it comes time to put the last wood pegs in I found it easier to put them into the middle panel first then sit it down on top of the doors and screw down. you'll see when you get there.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great little TV stand
customer_reviews.text: I love this entertainment stand. It matches perfectly with my other Ameriwood tables in the room and was super simple to assemble. I did reinforce the assembly with wood glue, but it’s super sturdy and holds my surround sound speaker, cable box, and game console with no problems. It even has small doors to put the controllers and games in so they aren’t sitting out
customer_reviews.author: Eva J

customer_reviews.title: Missing some pieces, a little bit fragile
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, for the most part is fine, but was missing parts and is somewhat fragile in building. Just a warning to be a little more cautious when building and check your parts. Specifically the pieces I was missing were the wooden dowels, however, I don't think they're necessary since the shear (tensile?) strength of the stand seems enough to handle it without. Edit: 6/5/17 update, It holds up well even with significant weight on top of it in the form of toys and a TV so I have added a star to the review.
customer_reviews.author: wsrdbro87

customer_reviews.title: Substantial piece of furniture for the price
customer_reviews.text: A substantial piece of furniture for the price. I did not understand the advice of other reviewers to assemble and attach the doors first, but once I was trying to attach the doors near the end of the process, and finding it very difficult, I then understood what they meant. Make sure that you attach the hinges to the doors and the side pieces of wood first, then start at the beginning of the instructions. Except for that, the parts were very clearly marked with stickers and the instructions were clear. Also, I found the height of the stand to be too high for a large screen (55") so I didn't use the top shelf. Still very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love that it was easy to read directions unlike lots ...
customer_reviews.text: First off, I absolutely love that it was easy to read directions unlike lots of other put it together pieces you can get elsewhere. Everything was clearly labeled and easy to deal with. That said it was great until I had to put the gates of hell (the front cabinets) together, Cerberus himself looked at me and sighed wistfully before laying down to his fate. If you get this, do yourself a favor and attach the doors before you do anything else because you'll save yourself tons of headache that way. Shelves could also be more sturdy but for what they will be used for, they will work.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece.
customer_reviews.text: The stand is beautiful. Perfect for large screen TVs. However assembly was quite difficult especially considering it did not come with instructions. The manufacturer actually emailed them to me. But even those were difficult to follow. The wood was very hard to screw in the screws. I would recommend an electric screw driver. Overall once it's assembled it's a very nice piece.
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand about 2 years ago at this point. It is a great stand. We have a 40"-45" TV I think. Never had any stability issues with it. The cupboards hold our DVD's, tucked out of site. Room to store a gaming system or your internet router in the shelves underneath. The middle shelf area has some tiny figurines and misc. stuff that I don't have anywhere else to display. Built well for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Another open box reject sold as new.
customer_reviews.text: Again I received another sold/partially assembled, and returned item from Amazon. That makes at least three in the past few weeks. Using wood glue and a lot of patience I got the piece together. The pre drilled holes were off center for the right hand cabinet door and hangs off kilter, and other than a few ugly scratches (new by Amazon's Standards) it looks ok.
customer_reviews.author: will edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment/ TV stand
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and has lots of room to hold all out gaming consoles and things. There was a slight issue where one of the door handle screws were off but it did a small DIY fix. Also, the door doesn't fit perfectly, it scrapes just a bit when you open and close it but I would say it's great for the price. You can't expect perfection with such a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Hikkilove

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, poor implementation
customer_reviews.text: To me, this is a nice-looking unit, and fulfills its intended purpose. However, as others have pointed out, the particle board used for its construction is very soft. Thus, it is easy to damage the unit when simply trying to, for example, insert a cam bolt. And, once the particle board gives way, so does the black finish. Speaking of cam bolts, the holes for these don't have pre-drilled threads, so it is easy to end up with a crooked bolt; fortunately the cams don't seem to mind. I like the design and looks of the unit, but wish the construction material was more robust.
customer_reviews.author: William G.

customer_reviews.title: Not Just a Good Value, but a Genuinely Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I was strapped for cash in a new apartment in a new city. I bought a bed, a futon and that was all I had. I purchased this just to get my TV off the floor. It took me a few hours to get this thing assembled, but it looks amazing, and is pretty tough too. I never expected to keep this thing long term, but as well as it holds together and as good as it looks I see absolutely no reason to replace it. I've moved it around quite a bit and it's still going strong. Overall I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Adroa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking and a good value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking. Its was exactly what we were looking for. We got it for our 65in TV. It is very sturdy and was pretty easy to assemble. It took 2 of us a little less than an hours to put together. Make sure you have a drill or electric screwdriver, it will make assembly so much easier. Very good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: smidget

customer_reviews.title: Too small and easy to dent/scratch.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 2 stars because it was a little smaller in size than it look online. One of the metal feet didn't screw in right so it ripped/cracked off a chunk of the wood therefore I had to go with one less supporting leg. Good thing it is still stable. Material isn't that great. feels cheaply made and dented on every piece. Assembly was easy though. Took about an hour. Everthing was clearly marked/label and instruction was easy to follow. Would I buy it again? No. Looks nice but quality isn't that good but if you have a small budget and smaller size room, this might be perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but had some problems while building
customer_reviews.text: This is a really sleek looking TV stand. It took two of us about an hour and a half to build. While trying to screw one of the metal posts at the top into the very top slab of wood, the nut on the other end was stripped or something so that the wood split around it and it never actually screwed in. Because this was on the top though, and the other four did screw in fine, I just left it as it was and put it up with my TV on it. My tv is a 49" and it fits perfectly. It's held up for a few months so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but looks good
customer_reviews.text: This is my second tv stand from this company. I have a smaller one in my bedroom that’s perfect. I upgraded for my living room but it came scratched, a wood rod was broken, a nail was broken and last but not least with putting on the last leg the wood broke. Very poor quality compared to the last one I got. It was easy to put together. Came in perfect condition! You get what you pay for. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This tv stand is perfect for my 50 inch tv, it could easily fit a 65" in today's standards. It has a good weight to it and feels like very good quality for the money. It works great for my needs and has plenty of storage for all your entertainment needs. Set up is easy, but I'd recommend two people work on it to speed up the process. All tools needed are included and the directions are easy to follow.I would recommend this for anyone looking for a smaller, yet effective entertainment center for a game room, apartment, or any living space!
customer_reviews.author: Sean C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and modern look!
customer_reviews.text: This was 50% off when I purchased, but I would honestly pay full price for this TV stand! I had the smaller version of this for my 55 inch TV a few years ago, so that has now moved to the bedroom, and this glorious piece of furniture now holds my 65 inch LG TV. -Great Price -Very easy to assemble -Sturdy and safe -Very appealing modern style -Plenty of space for cable boxes/video games/Blue Ray players
customer_reviews.author: Rob Cline

customer_reviews.title: WTF Ameriwood, i was going to buy your stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a month ago ( December 2018) for 50 bucks now its listed for 120, product is solid looks good, had no missing part, but alas i did not buy the coffee table and audio stand so now im stuck with the item without matching set. Assemvly time is fair probably 2 hours if u take it causually without power tools. it was worth original price not current... and now i dont have option to get matching colors sinceim bot paying raised prices and other on marlet colors dont match this cherry color
customer_reviews.author: Dobsas

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: nice looking stand for the money came with easy step by step assembly instruction but unfortunately the one i got few parts is cracked and legs are bent . I submitted form for replacement parts online thru ameriwood.com and waiting to see how soon the parts will get here . Well after 2 days since I filled out the part replacement form my parts finally here . Ameriwood has a very good customer service . I don't have to call or talk to no one just fill out the form and state what parts need to replace . They will be shipped out asap.
customer_reviews.author: Son T Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good item if it weren’t damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two at the same time. I received one on time and if I only bought the one, the review would be 5 stars. The second arrived 3 days later in a mangled box. With the amount of packaging in the first i didn’t think anything of it and now regret not taking a picture. I have three broken or damaged pieces for the product. While they damaged parts will be hidden against the wall and only i will know it’s broken, they are still broken. I’ve been waiting long enough for the item and it won’t fit in my car to return it, i will keep it but am dissatisfied with what i received.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: For $53, this product just cant be beat. Everything was shipped fine and all pieces were there and in perfect shape. Only took me about 45 minutes to fully assemble. People in these reviews are complaining about it not being sturdy or falling apart. This is obviously due to operator error. DO NOT USE A DRILL TO ASSEMBLE! Use a screw driver only and DO NOT OVER TIGHTEN. If you follow the instructions as given, this thing assembles perfectly and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: amber.t

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Price was right. Smaller/shorter in all dimensions than I imagined it would be, any narrower and the TV feet would not have fit on it. Relatively easy to assemble, took just over an hour. If the quality of the panels were better it would've received a 4 if not 5 star from me, I was disappointed when I removed the little circular parts identifying labels from the assembled boards and found a couple were intentionally placed over flaws/blemishes in the wood. When I flipped the whole thing over after assembly there was a very visible chip out of the middle top panel. Not much you're going to do about it after you've put the whole thing together.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchy-Boy

customer_reviews.title: Shipped without instructions, "espresso" not espresso.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the wood is decent for the price. However, the color is off. I ordered the espresso, and every item I have that is labeled espresso from other manufacturers, which match each other, do not come close to matching this "espresso". The pictured item on here is in no way indicative of the true color. What I received is essentially black. On top of the discoloration, the item was shipped without installation instructions. As other reviewers stated they had done, I had to go to ameriwood's site to download the instruction manual PDF.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Ok so of course you have to put this stand together I'm a 31 year old female by myself so I put together a lot of things I bought the for a 50inch 40lbs tv Ok putting it together wasn't hard but wasn't easy when your screwing the poles in if your like me and screw tight because you want it stable don't I screwed the pole so tight the bolt in the stand came right off on the pole 😑 I screwed the bolt off the pole and pushed it back in the stand so don't over tighten it. But it's nice when everything comes together. Yes it's in my bedroom 😂😂
customer_reviews.author: D. Wellington

customer_reviews.title: Great stand, bad instructions!!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is because of the instructions. First of all, it did not come with any. That's fine, we were able to look them up online. But when it came to putting the hinges on the doors, it was a HUGE problem. You should really put the hinges on during step 2 or 3, not at the end. We ended up having to unscrew everything to attach the doors. It took us about 2 hours to put it together. Other than that the assembly process was quick and easy. The stand itself is great. It came well packaged with no damage. The extra storage is really nice for movies or extra cables.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Lengthy process
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived in less than 48 hours and boy it is so heavy. It took about 2 hours for completing the assembly. Door hinges are little tricky. Attach them to the Wall first and then to the door. Quality of Wood is not so great but it holds my 55 Inch Samsung TV perfectly. I didn't need any additional tools except a Screw Driver. It takes 2 people to complete the assembly (of course I am not an expert). Instructions were pretty straight forward. It does what it is intended for the price. Doesn't look bad at all in my home
customer_reviews.author: Radha Madhav

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried after reading the reviews, but it turned out great. It took awhile to put together but that's because I had two toddlers helping me. The instructions were easy to follow. Some of the complaints were not being able to stand up DVD/games in the cupboard. That's true. You'll have to lie them down or not use the adjustable shelf inside so you can stand them up.. I don't have many because the games are saved on the gaming system and we don't keep the boxes to DVDs. The only con is getting the doors on straight because they have the adjustable latches. You'll just have to play with them a bit.
customer_reviews.author: TerriSue

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: What kind of nut makes a living room piece with a top that’s in 3 sections????? Bugs the hell out of me everytime I look at it. There’s 2 seams you now have to hide on the top piece. - no good. Also to many pieces! Took handyman almost 2 hours to assemble. Won’t buy again and feel like throwing in the trash everytime I look at it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark DeVoe

product_meta.title: Ameriwood Home Carson TV Stand for TVs up to 70" Wide (Cherry)
product_meta.description: Style Name:TV Stand 70"| Color:CherryElevate your entertainment space with the great-looking contemporary Ameriwood Home Carson TV Stand. The clean lines of this MDF and laminated particleboard TV stand with a two-tone cherry/black finish and silver metal accents makes this piece stand out in any room. Accommodating up to a 70-inch flat screen TV, this stand creates a sleek and stylish showcase for your home theater system, with multiple open shelves for numerous audio components. Two side cabinets discreetly store movies, music, video games, gaming controllers, and other items. Keep all your cables tangle-free with large holes in the back. After assembly, this stand is 20.5" H x 63" W x 15.35" D. This item comes with a one-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Elevate your entertainment space with the great-looking contemporary Ameriwood Home Carson TV Stand.
The clean lines of this MDF and laminated particleboard TV stand with a two-tone cherry/black finish and silver metal accents makes this piece stand out in any room.
Accommodating up to a 70-inch flat screen TV, this stand creates a sleek and stylish showcase for your home theater system, with multiple open shelves for numerous audio components.
Two side cabinets discreetly store movies, music, video games, gaming controllers, and other items. Keep all your cables tangle-free with large holes in the back.
After assembly, this stand is 20.5" H x 63" W x 15.35" D. This item comes with a one-year limited warranty. Dust and wipe with a dry cloth and if needed, a damp cloth may be used sparingly
Dust and wipe with a dry cloth and if needed, a damp cloth may be used sparingly.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars10,221 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
